fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Education and training, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Communication
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The goal of Kunstvallei is to merge all data concerning cultural production in the sense of authorship as well as all data concerning the marketing of the products of artistic authorship into one database that will be managed by authors (artists) as well as producers, venues, and the public in their common interest.
